title: Core engine loop
description:
Main Ralph iteration loop.

internal/engine/engine.go:
- Engine struct (agent, ticks, budget, checkpoint, scratchpad)
- RunConfig (EpicID, MaxIterations, MaxCost, CheckpointEvery, ResumeFrom)
- Run(ctx, config) (*RunResult, error)

Loop logic:
1. Check budget limits
2. Get next task (tk next epic)
3. Build prompt with context
4. Run agent
5. Parse signals
6. Update budget
7. Checkpoint if interval
8. Exit on signal or budget exceeded

internal/engine/iteration.go:
- runIteration(ctx, state) (*IterationResult, error)
- Single iteration lifecycle

Verify: Can complete a simple epic with multiple tasks.
